jobDescription: Job Post Index  1F6386-Sy## Location  Pennington, NJ Description:Key Responsibilities and Major DutiesSupport Medical Safety Assessment Physicians (MSAP) in leading Safety Data Review (SDR) Teams.Perform core signal detection activitiesElevate program or portfolio issues impacting benefit risk, priorities, resources, milestones with appropriate oversight.Author safety data query responsesContribute to specified sections of the Periodic Benefit Risk Update Report (PBRER) and Development Safety Update Report.Ensure pharmacovigilance regulatory compliance with oversight, as needed.Lead Safety Data Review (SDR) Teams, and participate in related PV and product-development subteam(s) in a specified therapeutic area.
